name: Doctor Watson - The Riddle of the Catacombs
description: Dr. Watson experiences in the new part of the successful "3D Hidden Object" games exciting adventures at amazing destinations. NEW: The Gameplay of the famous Hidden Object Games will be ported to 3rd dimension.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Core 2, AMD Athlon 3000+ or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6800 series, AMD X1650 (256 MB Vram) or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
